Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Built-out view space with existing improvements located in central Lonsdale. This location has a plethora of amenities in the neighborhood, and is located a few blocks from Lions Gate Hospital. This space is ideal for physiotherapy or other medical uses based on the current improvements.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SUBLEASE | 4,689 SF IMPROVED MEDICAL OR OFFICE SPACE

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Ideally located in the lower Lonsdale area of North Vancouver. The property is near Lonsdale Quay and Waterfront Park. Public transit is next door, offering services throughout the North Shore. The seabus is within walking distance providing direct access to Downtown Vancouver. All amenities, groceries, banks, restaurants, and recreations are nearby.Building amenities including fitness facility and secure bike storage. Unit features including North facing panoramic views, lunchroom, mainly open plan with meeting rooms and furniture (Optional).

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SUBLEASE | 3,225 SQ. FT. OFFICE SPACE

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Opportunity to lease an office unit in North Vancouver’s Harbourside Business Park. This office is located on the top floor of a two storey mixed-use building. Steps from the front entrance is the Harbourside Café offering coffee and take out. This office has excellent views of Downtown from the south facing windows as well as windows on the north side of the space.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR LEASE | IMPROVED SPACE WITH OPEN PLAN AND PRIVATE OFFICES

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: This waterfront office building comprises three floors of approximately 26,000 square feet each, which has been designed to facilitate office users from 2,000 square feet to 26,000 square feet. The building offers fantastic views of the city, ocean and mountains and includes high-speed fibre optic connectivity and generous Internet bandwidth. The building is professionally ownedand managed by Concert Properties.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SUBLEASE | Vancouver Office Space With Flexible Demising Options From 3,325 SF - 16,150 SF
